1.2.name: wordpress/wp-paypal-simple-donation-widget
1.2.description: This easy to use paypal sidebar widget allows you to place a paypal button within your Wordpress theme. Choose between 3 standard paypal buttons or use your own custom button. This great paypal payment/donation widget will also allow you to put in custom text or html to display before the button within your widget. It also allows for you to enter a default or minimum amount to be paid as well as specify the name or a custom payment page from your PayPal account profile. Enter a custom URL or page within your website to direct the user to once they have made the donation or payment.Features * Choose 3 standard PayPal buttons or use a custom button * Easy to use and install * Add custom text or HTML to display within your widget * Use custom PayPal payment pages to show during the payment process * Uses Wordpress resources (no extra files needed) * USes your themes CSS so the widget will look just like the rest of your website * Support available
